nodes.html: Environmental Science: Atmospheres follows a single-anonymised peer review process, with manuscripts handled by experienced associate editors. It consists of the following stages:

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: Phase 1 - your manuscript is initially assessed by an Associate Editor.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: Phase 2 - the Associate Editor solicits the expertise of at least two reviewers to assess your article and submit a report.

any.message: All page content is contained by landmarks

nodes.html: Phase 3 - the Associate Editor handling your manuscript makes a decision based on the reviewer reports recieved. In the event that no clear decision can be made, another senior reviewer will be consulted.
